htsjdk.samtools.util
Class Histogram<K extends java.lang.Comparable>

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      java.util.TreeMap<K,Histogram.Bin>
          htsjdk.samtools.util.Histogram<K>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<K,Histogram.Bin>, java.util.NavigableMap<K,Histogram.Bin>, java.util.SortedMap<K,Histogram.Bin>
public class Histogram<K extends java.lang.Comparable>
extends java.util.TreeMap<K,Histogram.Bin>

Class for computing and accessing histogram type data. Stored internally in a sorted Map so that keys can be iterated in order.

Author:
Tim Fennell
See Also:
Serialized Form

estimateSdViaMad

public double estimateSdViaMad()
Returns a value that is intended to estimate the mean of the distribution, if the distribution is essentially normal, by using the median absolute deviation to remove the effect of erroneous massive outliers.
